title: You must care for yourself because you are not your own, JBP 12 Rules for Life Chapter 2
description:
Jordan Peterson in this chapter starts to echo a bunch of Reformed theology and the Heidelberg catechism. He got me preaching on this one. I also thought he made a lot of similar points as Peter Kreeft, Professor of Philosophy at Boston College. 

12 Rules for Life https://www.amazon.com/12-Rules-Life-Antidote-Chaos-ebook/dp/B01FPGY5T0 

Slate Star Codex "How Bad Are Things" http://slatestarcodex.com/2015/12/24/how-bad-are-things/ 

CS Lewis "The Great Divorce" https://www.amazon.com/Great-Divorce-C-S-Lewis-ebook/dp/B002BD2US4 

The Heidelberg Catechism https://www.crcna.org/welcome/beliefs/confessions/heidelberg-catechism 

The Dark Side by Peter Kreeft https://youtu.be/LGhCfuTiabc 

AA's 12 Steps https://www.recovery.org/topics/alcoholics-anonymous-12-step/
